verses.verse: Now these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Hebron: <S%H2275><s%> the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> Amnon, <S%H550><s%> of Ahinoam <S%H293><s%> the Jezreelitess; <S%H3159><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> of Abigail <S%H26><s%> the Carmelitess; <S%H3762><s%>

the third, <S%H7992><s%> Absalom <S%H53><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maacah <S%H4601><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Talmai <S%H8526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Geshur; <S%H1650><s%> the fourth, <S%H7243><s%> Adonijah <S%H138><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Haggith; <S%H2294><s%>
the fifth, <S%H2549><s%> Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> of Abital; <S%H37><s%> the sixth, <S%H8345><s%> Ithream <S%H3507><s%> by Eglah <S%H5698><s%> his wife: <S%H802><s%>

six <S%H8337><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> and there he reigned <S%H4427><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> months. <S%H2320><s%> In Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> he reigned <S%H4427><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> - three <S%H7969><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%>

and these were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> Shimea, <S%H8092><s%> and Shobab, <S%H7727><s%> and Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> and Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> four, <S%H702><s%> of Bathshua <S%H1340><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ammiel; <S%H5988><s%>
and Ibhar, <S%H2984><s%> and Elishama, <S%H476><s%> and Eliphelet, <S%H467><s%>
and Nogah, <S%H5052><s%> and Nepheg, <S%H5298><s%> and Japhia, <S%H3309><s%>
and Elishama, <S%H476><s%> and Eliada, <S%H450><s%> and Eliphelet, <S%H467><s%> nine. <S%H8672><s%>
All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> besides the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the concubines; <S%H6370><s%> and Tamar <S%H8559><s%> was their sister. <S%H269><s%>

Solomon <S%H8010><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%> was Rehoboam, <S%H7346><s%> Abijah <S%H29><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Asa <S%H609><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Joram <S%H3141><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Joash <S%H3101><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Amaziah <S%H558><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Jotham <S%H3147><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Ahaz <S%H271><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Amon <S%H526><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Josiah <S%H2977><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah: <S%H2977><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Johanan, <S%H3110><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> Jehoiakim, <S%H3079><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> Zedekiah, <S%H6667><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%> Shallum. <S%H7967><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim: <S%H3079><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeconiah, <S%H3204><s%> the captive: <S%H617><s%> Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
and Malchiram, <S%H4443><s%> and Pedaiah, <S%H6305><s%> and Shenazzar, <S%H8137><s%> Jekamiah, <S%H3359><s%> Hoshama, <S%H1953><s%> and Nedabiah. <S%H5072><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pedaiah: <S%H6305><s%> Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> and Shimei. <S%H8096><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerubbabel: <S%H2216><s%> Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> and Hananiah; <S%H2608><s%> and Shelomith <S%H8019><s%> was their sister; <S%H269><s%>
and Hashubah, <S%H2807><s%> and Ohel, <S%H169><s%> and Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> and Hasadiah, <S%H2619><s%> Jushab Hesed, <S%H3142><s%> five. <S%H2568><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hananiah: <S%H2608><s%> Pelatiah, <S%H6410><s%> and Jeshaiah; <S%H3470><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rephaiah, <S%H7509><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Arnan, <S%H770><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Obadiah, <S%H5662><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shecaniah. <S%H7935><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shecaniah: <S%H7935><s%> Shemaiah. <S%H8098><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah: <S%H8098><s%> Hattush, <S%H2407><s%> and Igal, <S%H3008><s%> and Bariah, <S%H1282><s%> and Neariah, <S%H5294><s%> and Shaphat, <S%H8202><s%> six. <S%H8337><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Neariah: <S%H5294><s%> Elioenai, <S%H454><s%> and Hizkiah, <S%H2396><s%> and Azrikam, <S%H5840><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elioenai: <S%H454><s%> Hodaviah, <S%H1939><s%> and Eliashib, <S%H475><s%> and Pelaiah, <S%H6411><s%> and Akkub, <S%H6126><s%> and Johanan, <S%H3110><s%> and Delaiah, <S%H1806><s%> and Anani, <S%H6054><s%> seven. <S%H7651><s%>
